title: Language Education Assessment and Strategy Improvement Process for Children with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in special education or language education, and LMS (Learning Management System) proficiency
context.additional_context: Participants analyze language development characteristics of children with intellectual disabilities and case studies of assessment tools, developing strategies applicable to real educational settings through project-based evaluations.

learning_goals: Learners can adapt and apply the EVALOE assessment tool to special education contexts.
Learners can systematically observe and evaluate communication functions and strategies in children with intellectual disabilities.
Learners can design collaborative strategies for teachers to improve context-specific communication management, instructional design, and strategies.

resources: Adaptive Version of the EVALOE Assessment Tool
Language Sample Videos for Children with Intellectual Disabilities

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
